page.title: 14MY FRIEND FROM CHELTENHAM
page.content: {LIFE STYLES.}My friend is Helen Scott, she is 10 years old. She has brownish hair which looks as though it has been flicked. She has brown eyes, her nose does not stick out much and it looks as though it is soft. She has a nice smile which makes her look very pretty. She has two ambitions. One is to see the pop group WHAM! and the other is to be a surgeon. She has quite a nice personality. She isn't particularly greedy or unkind. She laughs at most things and does not like to see people upset. She sometimes shouts a lot as well. Helen has a few games that she likes, hockey, football, netball and basketball. She always wears fashion- able clothes out of school. I like Helen a lot. She is my best friend.
